entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 70%
